kv9.2:1.3_0: Amataṁ saṁyojaniyaṁ ganthaniyaṁ oghaniyaṁ yoganiyaṁ nīvaraṇiyaṁ parāmaṭṭhaṁ upādāniyaṁ saṅkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:1.7_0: Hañci amataṁ asaṁyojaniyaṁ …pe… asaṅkilesiyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:2.3_0: Amataṁ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ rajaniyaṁ kamaniyaṁ madaniyaṁ bandhaniyaṁ mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:2.5_0: nanu amataṁ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ na rajaniyaṁ na kamaniyaṁ na madaniyaṁ na bandhaniyaṁ na mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:2.7_0: Hañci amataṁ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ na rajaniyaṁ na kamaniyaṁ na madaniyaṁ na bandhaniyaṁ na mucchaniyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:3.5_0: nanu amataṁ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:3.7_0: Hañci amataṁ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:4.3_0: Amataṁ mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ aññāṇakaraṇaṁ acakkhukaraṇaṁ paññānirodhiyaṁ vighātapakkhiyaṁ anibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:4.5_0: nanu amataṁ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ na aññāṇakaraṇaṁ na acakkhukaraṇaṁ paññābuddhiyaṁ avighātapakkhiyaṁ nibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:4.7_0: Hañci amataṁ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ na aññāṇakaraṇaṁ …pe…
kv9.2:4.8_0: nibbānasaṁvattaniyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.2:6.1_1: rūpaṁ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ rajaniyaṁ kamaniyaṁ madaniyaṁ bandhaniyaṁ mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:9.1_1: amataṁ asaṁyojaniyaṁ aganthaniyaṁ anoghaniyaṁ ayoganiyaṁ anīvaraṇiyaṁ aparāmaṭṭhaṁ anupādāniyaṁ asaṅkilesiyanti?
kv9.2:10.1_1: amataṁ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ na rajaniyaṁ na kamaniyaṁ na madaniyaṁ na bandhaniyaṁ na mucchaniyanti?
kv9.2:10.3_0: Rūpaṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṁ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ …pe…
kv9.2:11.1_1: amataṁ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:11.3_1: rūpaṁ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
kv9.2:12.1_1: amataṁ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ na aññāṇakaraṇaṁ …pe… nibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:12.3_1: rūpaṁ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ na aññāṇakaraṇaṁ …pe… nibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
kv9.2:13.5_1: nibbānaṁ nibbānato sañjānitvā nibbānaṁ maññati, nibbānasmiṁ maññati, nibbānato maññati, nibbānaṁ meti maññati, nibbānaṁ abhinandatī”ti.
